        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[updateAgentInactivityCheck();

function updateAgentInactivityCheck() {
    var gr = new GlideRecord('awa_presence_state');
    if (!gr.isValid())
        return;

    gr.setValue('disable_inactivity_check', false);
    gr.setWorkflow(false);
    gr.updateMultiple();
}]]></script>
